forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Under a sun that has freed itself from the morning haze, Downtown San Francisco basks in a refreshing clarity. As the day unfolds, temperatures hover around a pleasant sixty-one, gradually yielding to a comfortable fifty-nine by afternoon. A gentle west-southwest wind caresses the face, occasionally invigorated by sharper gusts, reminiscent of whispers through the city’s iconic streets. While the blue sky prevails, hints of a lighter marine layer linger off shore, teasing with the prospect of a coastal dance, though visibility remains largely unobstructed.

As evening approaches, a veil of part-cloudiness encroaches, tingeing the atmosphere with an inviting softness, the perfect precursor to the night ahead. As you venture out, consider layering with a light jacket; the cool breeze may wrap around your shoulders with a cheeky chill as the sun dips low. The air invites quiet strolls along the waterfront, where the sounds of the city intermingle with the gentle lapping of waves, or perhaps a visit to a cozy café to enjoy a warm drink and a good book. Today, the city offers a canvas of simple pleasures — a reminder to find joy in the little moments while wrapped in the unique charm that only San Francisco can provide.
